comments.body:
@Axel-Naumann I see that we need to prioritize PR.... I tried to build ROOT master (without this PR) from scratch and I see next failure:
`[ 41%] Building CXX object core/rootcling_stage1/CMakeFiles/rootcling_stage1.dir/src/rootcling_stage1.cxx.o
cd /home/oksana/CERN_sources/root-rtcxxmodules/builds/core/rootcling_stage1 && /usr/bin/c++   -I/home/oksana/CERN_sources/root-rtcxxmodules/builds/include -I/home/oksana/CERN_sources/root-rtcxxmodules/core/dictgen/res  -std=c++11 -Wno-implicit-fallthrough -Wno-noexcept-type -pipe  -Wshadow -Wall -W -Woverloaded-virtual -fsigned-char -pthread -O3 -DNDEBUG   -std=c++11 -fno-rtti -o CMakeFiles/rootcling_stage1.dir/src/rootcling_stage1.cxx.o -c /home/oksana/CERN_sources/root-rtcxxmodules/core/rootcling_stage1/src/rootcling_stage1.cxx
/home/oksana/CERN_sources/root-rtcxxmodules/core/rootcling_stage1/src/rootcling_stage1.cxx:12:10: fatal error: RConfigure.h: No such file or directory
   12 | #include "RConfigure.h" `
This PR will solve a current problem...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@   ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/core/base/inc    # for RConfig.hxx
   ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/core/dictgen/res # for rootcling_impl.h
   ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ginclude         # for RConfigure.h
)
